title: Mojave National Preserve: Parks as Classrooms
body: Parks as Classrooms        Field Trips Bring your students to Mojave National Preserve. Find resources for planning your own trip, links to program descriptions, and more.  All Field Trips     Curriculum Materials Bring the Mojave Desert to your students. Review our teacher guides. All Curriculum Materials     Guest Speakers Invite a ranger to your classroom. Programs are available in Needles, Barstow, and Victor Valley in California. All Guest Speakers     Institutes & Field Schools Our partner associations provide professional development field courses for teachers as well as environmental education programming in Barstow, California and field trips for Barstow area youth. All Institutes & Field Schools
